statements: SELECT * FROM international_students;
SELECT student_name, country FROM international_students ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM international_students WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, university FROM international_students ORDER BY university DESC;

SELECT student_name, major, university FROM international_students WHERE country = 'Canada' AND major = 'Computer Science';
